title: 276. O Vha A Tshi toda nne

lines: 1. Yesu o bebwa ngei Betlehema, Mukungwani lu tungufhadzaho
Zwo mangadza ndi uri zwo da hani? A tshi toda nne.
A tshi toda nne-vho, A tshi toda nne-vho
Zwo mangadza uri zwo tou da hani? A tshi toda nne.
2. Ene Yesu ngei Khalivari. O lifha mulandu muhulusa
Zwo mangadza uri zwo da hani? A tshi fela nne.
A tshi fela nne-vho, A tshi fela nne-vho
Zwo mangadza uri zwo da hani? A tshi fela nne.
3. Ndi Mutshidzi tsha kale na kale, Zwila ndi kule na tshitumba,
O fhembeledza na mbilu yanga, A di mmbidza nne.
A di mmbidza nne-vho, A di mmbidza nne-vho
Zwo mangadza uri zwo da hani? A tshi mmbidza nne.
4. Ndi takalela fulufhedziso, U do da a tshi bva makoleni,
Ndi do mu vhona a tshi do vhuya, A tshi dela nne
A tshi dela nne-vho, A tshi dela nne-vho
Ndi do mu vhona a tshi do vhuya, A tshi dela nne.
